item.title: How I handle 1000+ emails and 300+ blog posts a day
item.description: Several people are shocked to hear that I read 1000+ emails and several hundred blog posts a day. Ofcourse, when I say that, all I mean is that, I process that much content. I read around 30-40% (That is really the signal-to-noise ratio of web content these days–and that is, if you are subscribed to high quality feeds) [caption id="" align=“alignnone” width=“450” caption=“google reader trends”][/caption] One of friends was curious how I can handle all that data flow, and I emailed her this:
